text: Christine Bakundufite (born September 29, 1970) is a Rwandan politician and economist, currently a member of the Chamber of Deputies in the Parliament of Rwanda.https://www.newtimes.co.rw/news/rubavu-women-candidates-pledge- economic-empowerment-and-accountability Bakundufite represents the Eastern Province and her district is Gatsibo District.https://www.parliament.gov.rw/index.php?id=125&width;=650&detailId;=365 Bakundufite has previously worked as a headmistress, accountant, and accountant specialist. In 2018, Bakundufite was elected to the Chamber of Deputies in the Parliament of Rwanda == References == Category:Living people Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Rwanda) Category:1970 births
title: Christine Bakundufite
